title: Coverlet Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen, wool
Technique: twill weave
description: Ground in goose-eye (diamond twill) in blue and rust red wool with wide windowpane plaid of lighter blue wool outlined in undyed linen. Remains of border showing rust red wool warp continuous chevron on ground striped in undyed linen and shades of blue wool.

tombstone.epitaph:
Coverlet Fragment, 19th century.Medium: linen, wool
Technique: twill weave. 1953-218-70.
